data.title: Masood Ahmad - Physiotherapist at Gymnacity Fitness and Physiotherapy, Peshawar
data.meta_description: Masood Ahmad is a Physiotherapist at Gymnacity Fitness and Physiotherapy, Peshawar, University Town, Peshawar. Call us to book appointment or consult online.
data.text:
Short Height

Hello, I'm a 17 years old male and my height is 137 cm (4ft 6in). I've always been really short, but I don't think I'm going to grow much taller and I'd like to do something about it as soon as I can. What should I do?

Masood Ahmad practices through Marham.pk. The Physiotherapist

Qualifications: DPT from Khyber Medical College, Peshawar and Masters in Musculoskeletal and Sports from Ripha University, Islamabad

Experience: 2.5 years of experience in this field.

Services of Masood Ahmad

The Physiotherapist's, Masood Ahmad, special areas of interest include:

Dry Needling

Manipulation And Mobilization

Sports Physiotherapy

Diseases treated by Masood Ahmad

Diseases treated by Masood Ahmad include:

Spondylosis

Lymphoedema

Frozen Shoulder, and among others

Masood Ahmad's Appointment Details

Masood Ahmad, the Physiotherapist, is available for in-person and online video consultation on Marham.

Video Consultation

Days: Monday to Saturday

Time: 12:30 PM - 09:45 PM

Gymnacity Fitness and Physiotherapy: University Town, Peshawar.

Days: Monday to Saturday

Time: 12:00 PM - 08:00 PM

Masood Ahmad's Fee

Masood Ahmad's fee is PKR 800 for online video consultation.

Book an appointment or video consultation with the Physiotherapist, Masood Ahmad, through Marham. Top rated other medical practitioners from different specialties including Diabetologist, Gynecologic Oncologist and Bariatric / Weight Loss Surgeon are also on our panel for in-person appointment/booking and online video consultation.
